actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to modify the Rio Grande Bank Projection Project, Texas.

summary.text: Modifies the Rio Grande bank protection project to permit its bank protection activities to be undertaken in Starr County, Texas, in accordance with such specifications as may be prepared for such purpose by the International Boundary and Water Commission, United States and Mexico.

titles.title: A bill to modify the Rio Grande Bank Projection Project, Texas.
